title: Sir Mix-a-lot wept
author: VD
content_html:
In anatomy class, you got a butt-minus!

This ad is hysterical. Of course, even funnier than the ad is the idea that public school teachers should command so much respect that they cannot be objectified in this way. But what schoolboy wouldn’t like a slender, sexy teacher?
content_text:

This ad is hysterical.  Of course, even funnier than the ad is the idea that public school teachers should command so much respect that they cannot be objectified in this way.  But what schoolboy wouldn’t like a slender, sexy teacher?
